description: This file defines mock classes for various HDMI CEC-related interfaces and implementations, primarily used for testing purposes. It includes mock classes for LibCCEC implementation, system audio status, audio status, power status, abort reasons, short audio descriptors, connection management, logical addresses, message encoding and decoding, with all classes utilizing Google Mock framework.

classes.name: LibCCECImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the LibCCECImpl interface, providing mock implementations of its methods for testing.

classes.name: SystemAudioStatusImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the SystemAudioStatusImpl interface, allowing controlled testing of audio status conversions.

classes.name: AudioStatusImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the AudioStatusImpl interface, simulating audio mute status and volume retrieval.

classes.name: PowerStatusImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the PowerStatusImpl interface, mocking power status conversions.

classes.name: AbortReasonImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the AbortReasonImpl interface, providing mock methods for abort reason conversions.

classes.name: ShortAudioDescriptorImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the ShortAudioDescriptorImpl interface, simulating retrieval of audio descriptor data.

classes.name: ConnectionImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for the ConnectionImpl interface, simulating connection behaviors including opening, closing, messaging, and pinging.

classes.name: LogicalAddressImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for LogicalAddressImpl, used for mocking logical address retrieval.

classes.name: MessageEncoderMock
classes.description: Mock class for message encoding operations, used to test CEC frame encoding.

classes.name: MessageDecoderMock
classes.description: Mock class for message decoding operations, used to test CEC frame decoding.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the CEC implementation or mock.

methods.name: term
methods.description: Terminates or cleans up the CEC implementation or mock.

methods.name: getPhysicalAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the physical address of a CEC device.

methods.name: addLogicalAddress
methods.description: Adds a logical address for a device.

methods.name: getLogicalAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the logical address based on device type.

methods.name: toInt
methods.description: Converts a status or reason to its integer representation.

methods.name: getAudioMuteStatus
methods.description: Gets the muting status of audio.

methods.name: addFrameListener
methods.description: Adds a listener for frame events.

methods.name: sendToAsync
methods.description: Sends a frame asynchronously to a device.

methods.name: sendTo
methods.description: Sends a frame to a device, potentially with a timeout.

methods.name: poll
methods.description: Polls a device for status or data.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Retrieves the type of a logical address.

methods.name: encode
methods.description: Encodes a data block or user control into a CEC frame.
